overview: A net found footage film. A song collection that evokes revolutions and resistances. An historical and international wandering of chants that appeal to throw down walls in front of the Dark Clouds. A compilation of musical notes that call to the Unbeatable Unity of the People or that Imagine a world in peace. A virtual, strange and sarcastic Alan Lomax. A melting of objets trouv√©s, remixes and arrangements born in the Internet Ocean, crazy mirror of the reality.
title: Songwar(e)
